pymoog
  • model
  • View page source

model

model.interpolate_model(teff, logg, m_h, vmicro=2, mass=1, abun_change=None, molecules=None, save_name=None, model_type='marcs', chem='st', geo='auto')

Interpolate Kurucz model or MARCS model and convert to moog format.

model.read_Kurucz_model(model_path)

Read the Kurucz model and save it as np.array.

Parameters

model_path (str) – The path of Kurucz model.

Returns

  • abun (np.array) – The ‘ABUNDANCE CHANGE’ part of Kurucz model. The first column is element number and second column is the abundance change.

  • model_lines (np.array) – The array of Kurucz model.

  • pradk (float) – The pradk number in Kurucz model.
